channel.title: I need some help with soem things
channel.description:
i need to know:
- How i change the xp rate of mage/fighting etc
-Changing Animation for when you die, teleport, and when an npc dies
- Make max lvl 99 instead of 135
-Make ancient tab be the original spell book and remove it from extra tab
thanks :)
